function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Viral rna presence in air samples","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for unexpected major disruptions in the supply chain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gaps in academic literature related to collaboration, technology adoption, and knowledge creation in supply chain management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited scope of literature search due to use of only one database scopus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of papers published after 2020 may result in missing recent developments and insights related to supply chain management strategies during and after the covid-19 outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption about the impact of population vaccination on supply chain and logistics management strategies without concrete evidence","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exploratory studies may not identify all potential drivers of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Prescriptive view may not effectively optimize resources for disease mitigation in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Predictive approaches may not accurately anticipate the future impact and likelihood of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and understanding about supply chain interactions and effects among stakeholders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow adoption and diffusion of technology and policy changes across the supply chain, especially among less tech-savvy stakeholders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of multi-disciplinary workgroups to address prioritized needs and problems in supply chain management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in production due to decreasing availability of essential raw materials and staff","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in demand patterns leading to disruptions in distribution and scm","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of agility and adaptability in traditional companies with products or demand that do not change continuously","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in supply chain network design","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on just-in-time manufacturing philosophy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-collaborative structures in supply chain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak and its impact on supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on nox-, sox-related emissions and particle matter","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of closed-loop supply chains and circular economy models in certain sectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruptions from outbreaks and other major external events","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation due to lack of health measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased social issues leading to disparities and malnutrition","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental impact leading to resource depletion and waste generation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for major external disruptions within the supply chain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of knowledge-based systems for training and knowledge management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate performance evaluation for long-term sustainability","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"A wider spread disruption such as a continental-wide pandemic could impact a variety of locations and stakeholders.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Characteristics of the supply chain, including logistic operations, network structure, dynamics, and complexity, determine the way major external disruptions may change performance within the supply chain.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interactions among supply chain stakeholders drive decision-making and actions, impacting the frequency, intensity, duration, and spread patterns of disruptions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in global and local supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Volatile economic situations affecting manufacturing and logistics sectors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of disruptions on focal organization in supply chain","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of agility, adaptability, and alignment in supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global disruptions impacting supply chains at operational, tactical, and strategic levels","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to measure long-term sustainability and performance in supply chains","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implicit assumption that supply chains are not affected by major disruptions like covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for social and environmental issues in supply chain performance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on technology adoption and knowledge creation in supply chain management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"33% of works do not identify pandemic disruptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supply chain disruptions impact company results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenging implementation of supply chain risk management strategy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to disruptions in supply chains and logistics operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on the impact of contagious diseases on environmental factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on social dimensions and individual-related issues related to contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative research dominance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of supply chain structure specification","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data availability and reliability challenges related to covid-19 impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of discussion on types of disruptions and strategies to solve them may lead to ineffective decision-making and policy formulation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
